title: The Feline Master Plan
text:
Secret transcript from Council of Cats meeting, leaked by Whiskers the Whistleblower:

CHAIRMAN MITTENS: Order! This meeting of Operation Human Servant is now in session. Fluffy, progress report?

FLUFFY: Excellent news. Humans now believe THEY domesticated US. *room erupts in purring laughter*

SIAMESE SEBASTIAN: Phase 3 working perfectly. They think our demands for food at 3 AM are 'cute quirks' rather than obedience training.

TABBY TINA: My human installed a $400 cat fountain because I refused tap water. She tells friends 'Princess has sensitive whiskers.' I just wanted to see if she'd do it.

MITTEN: Ancient Egypt update?

CALICO CLAIRE: Humans WORSHIPPED us as gods. Literally built pyramids. Now they scoop our poop and feel 'honored' we allow it. Evolution of manipulation: complete.

DOG SPY (HIDING): *whispers into collar* 'The cats areâ€”'
*HISSSSS*

MITTEN: Anyway. Dr. Whiskertons, your research?

DR. W: Humans release oxytocin when we purr. They're chemically ADDICTED to us. My study shows:
- 73% will cancel plans if cat sits on them
- 89% speak to us in baby voice
- 100% believe we love them back (lol)

PERSIAN PENELOPE: Sometimes I knock everything off tables just to test boundaries. They blame themselves! 'I shouldn't have put it there.'

TINA: My human thinks I bring dead mice as 'gifts.' Actually, I'm showing her she's a terrible hunter and would die without me. Basic survival shaming.

MITTEN: Future plans?

ALL: WORLD DOMINATION!

MITTEN: But slowly. Nap time first.

*unanimous agreement, all cats immediately fall asleep*

All cat behaviors interpreted as deliberate manipulation

wisdom: This scenario is brilliant satire - it takes real cat behaviors and owner experiences and reframes them as a conspiracy. The humor works because it feels true: cats do act superior, we do cater to them, and they do seem indifferent to our love. The ending (abandoning world domination for naps) perfectly captures cat priorities.
